price: 4. Ugu bishaareynaya (Janno Qofkii rumeeya Towxiidka Alle oo camallo san fasha)  una digaya (qofkii u shariig yeela Alle oo xuma fala), waase ka jeesadeen badankoodu, marka wax ma maqlaan.
arabic: بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا فَأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bashīran wanadhīran fa-aʿraḍa aktharuhum fahum lā yasmaʿūna
